attributes.action: treat as unlawful discrimination the growing view by mothers and authorities than all men are a danger to children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the news that Shropshire Council has authorised their employees to challenge men who happen to be alone in their parks, with the implicit presumption that they are likely to be paedophiles, the degradation of our society grows. Innocent men already feel uncomfortable being anywhere near children due to this climate of fear, yet men are fathers, and the backbones of their families' and the economy's support. This fear in groundless, unhealthy, and unnatural, and the Government needs to make this clear as a matter of urgency.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
